verses.text: And \add David\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* for it a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, None ought to \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* but the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: for them hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* to \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft None…: Heb. It is not to carry the ark of God, but for the Levites\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, which he had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for it.
And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*; \w Uriel|strong="H0222"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*:\f + \fr 15.5 \ft brethren: or, kinsmen\f*

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*:

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*; \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*:

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elizaphan|strong="H0469"\w*; \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*:
Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w*:

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*; \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and for the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, for \w Uriel|strong="H0222"\w*, \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, and \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye \add are\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves, \add both\add* ye and your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, that ye may bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto \add the place that\add* I have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for it.

For because ye \add did it\add* not at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* made a \w breach|strong="H6555"\w* upon us, for that we \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* him not after the due \w order|strong="H4941"\w*.

So the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon their \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* with the \w staves|strong="H4133"\w* thereon, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to \w appoint|strong="H5975"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \add to be\add* the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* with \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w*, \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* and \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w sounding|strong="H8085"\w*, by lifting \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

So the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*; and of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*; and of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kushaiah|strong="H6984"\w*;

And with them their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of the \w second|strong="H4932"\w* \add degree\add*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w Ben|strong="H1122"\w*, and \w Jaaziel|strong="H3268"\w*, and \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, and \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, and \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, and \w Elipheleh|strong="H0466"\w*, and \w Mikneiah|strong="H4737"\w*, and \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*.

So the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, and \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w*, \add were appointed\add* to \w sound|strong="H8085"\w* with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*;

And \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Aziel|strong="H5815"\w*, and \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, and \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* on \w Alamoth|strong="H5961"\w*;

And \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, and \w Elipheleh|strong="H0466"\w*, and \w Mikneiah|strong="H4737"\w*, and \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, and \w Azaziah|strong="H5812"\w*, with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* on the \w Sheminith|strong="H8067"\w* to \w excel|strong="H5329"\w*.\f + \fr 15.21 \ft on the…: or, on the eighth to oversee\f*

And \w Chenaniah|strong="H3663"\w*, \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add was\add* for \w song|strong="H4853"\w*: he \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w* about the \w song|strong="H4853"\w*, because he \add was\add* \w skilful|strong="H0995"\w*.\f + \fr 15.22 \ft was for…: or, was for the carriage: he instructed about the carriage\f*\f + \fr 15.22 \ft song: Heb. lifting up\f*
And \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w* and \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* \add were\add* \w doorkeepers|strong="H7778"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

And \w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3146"\w*, and \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*, and \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, and \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, did \w blow|strong="H2690"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* and \w Jehiah|strong="H3174"\w* \add were\add* \w doorkeepers|strong="H7778"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

¶ So \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that they \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* \w clothed|strong="H3736"\w* with a \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* of fine \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, and all the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, and \w Chenaniah|strong="H3663"\w* the \w master|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w song|strong="H4853"\w* with the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: \w David|strong="H1732"\w* also \add had\add* upon him an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* of \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*.\f + \fr 15.27 \ft song: or, carriage\f*

Thus all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, and with \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w cornet|strong="H7782"\w*, and with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, and with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, making a \w noise|strong="H8085"\w* with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, \add as\add* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, that \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* looking \w out|strong="H8259"\w* at a \w window|strong="H2474"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dancing|strong="H7540"\w* and \w playing|strong="H7832"\w*: and she \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* him in her \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
